/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy that filters the sunlight, casting dappled shadows on the road below. A red truck is parked on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, illuminating the entire scene with a warm glow.
